description: This file contains the implementation of the HttpClient class, including constructors, destructor, and methods for downloading files, progress updates, and data writing. It relies on libcurl for HTTP operations.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class that encapsulates HTTP file download functionality using libcurl, supporting progress tracking and error handling.

methods.name: HttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the CURL handle for HTTP operations.

methods.name: ~HttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the CURL handle.

methods.name: HttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified filename with optional rate limiting, returning a status code.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Callback function for tracking download progress, updates the progress percentage.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback function to write downloaded data to a file stream.

ctags.name: downloadFile
ctags.pattern: /^HttpClient::downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLim/

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ul/

ctags.name: write_data
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream) {$/
